DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , open-label , single arm , non-interventional study investigate effectiveness Avastin monotherapy patient lung adenocarcinoma previously receive 4 6 cycle induction platinum doublet plus Avastin . The study expect last approximately 28 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Examining Maintenance Avastin Monotherapy Patients With Advanced Lung Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Patients previously receive 4 6 cycle induction platinum doublet plus bevacizumab Patients receive 1 cycle bevacizumab maintenance treatment meet summary product characteristic guideline Patients receive first cycle maintenance bevacizumab 4 week postinduction tumor assessment Pregnant breastfeeding
